about_the_game:
Over The Top: WWI plunges you into the chaos of World War I. Engage in massive multiplayer battles with up to 200 players fighting simultaneously.

Engage in bombastic third- and first-person WW1 combat and leverage the fully destructible environment to your advantage. Arm yourself with a diverse arsenal, including rifles, artillery, and even tanks, as you navigate the mud-soaked battlefields of the Great War.

Explore multiple diverse character classes and their unique abilities to influence dangerous encounters with other players on the 12 available maps. Take a breath in additional single-player game modes, or design your own maps with the available map-editor.      

Gear up, soldier - and go Over the Top! The Great War awaits!

Fight in Massive Battles

Take part in massive multi- or single-player battles with up to 200 players or bots simultaneously fighting each other on the same battlefield, in a completely destructible and realistic first World War combat environment.

Destructible Environments

Destroy bridges, fell trees, punch holes in walls, blow up fences, destroy enemy fortifications; in Over The Top: WWI, everything is destructible.

Help your Team defend against the onslaught of enemy troops by digging defensive trenches and shape the battlefield as you see fit. Artillery shells, hand-grenades and rifle-grenades will create realistic craters in the ground. Shovels and pickaxes can be used to dig trenches.

Wind and lightning will break trees, rain and fog will lower visibility and heavy wind will alter ballistics. Over The Top: WWI features a dynamic weather, wind, season and time of day system.

Large Weapon Selection

Find your own playstyle! Bolt-Action Rifles, Revolvers, Pistols, Flamethrowers, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Axes, Clubs, Grenades… With more than 50 unique weapons, 6 different types of armored vehicles and 10 different Artillery pieces, you have plenty of options to choose from.

Take command of a selection of more than six armored vehicles. Choose to operate the formidable Ehrhardt E-V/4 Straßenpanzerwagen, showcasing your tactical finesse on the battlefield, or unleash the power of iconic tanks like the Mark IV or the agile yet potent Renault FT-17 and use those steel beats' destructive power to clear your path through the battlefield. 

Multiple Army Branches

Join the Infantry

Immerse yourself in the heart of the action as an infantryman. Explore diverse roles in the army, whether it's operating flamethrowers to clear trenches, wielding light machine guns for rapid suppression, or taking precise shots with bolt-action rifles.

Serve in the Artillery

Position yourself strategically and provide crucial support as a gunner in the Artillery Corps. Engage the enemy with a range of artillery, from light mortars to heavy artillery pieces. Rain down destruction on enemy positions and fortifications, or man the machine guns to suppress opposing forces.

Enlist as a Tanker

Embark to the front lines as a tanker, navigating the challenging terrain of the First World War in powerful tanks. As a tanker, you are not just a participant but a commander of undefeatable steel beasts, each equipped to handle the unique demands of the battlefield.

Muster as a Specialist

Enlist in the Engineer Corps and support your team by constructing various different defenses, such as barbed wire, chevaux de frise or sandbag walls. Quickly dig trenches with your pickaxe and provide cover to friendly soldiers. Or become a Specialist Gunner and destroy enemy tanks with heavy anti-tank rifles and dynamite.

More than 12 Battlefields

Fight on one of the 12 beautifully hand-crafted maps, inspired by real-world places and battlefields, or play on a randomly generated map, providing a different combat environment each time.

Bored of the pre-included maps? No problem! Create your own maps with powerful Map Editor included in Over The Top: WWI. And then share your maps with other players using the Steam Workshop.

Unique Singleplayer Modes

Over The Top: WWI offers several unique single-player modes: "Instant Battle" and "Build a Battle." Jump into the action in "Instant Battle" mode and take part in large-scale confrontations featuring up to 200 bots. In "Build a Battle" mode, you can customize your own battle scenarios by placing Soldiers, Cannons, Machine Guns, and Tanks on each side, then watch the chaos unfold as they clash in battle.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features mature content such as blood, gore and depictions of death.

name: Over The Top: WWI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join 200-player battles in Over The Top: WWI — an intense multiplayer shooter set in the gritty backdrop of World War I. Pick your class, choose from a vast arsenal, including rifles, artillery, and powerful tanks, and experience the chaos of fully destructible battlefields.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
